newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - National Semi buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - National Semi buy repeated.

text.p: -- Gruntal & Co Inc said Tuesday it reiterated a buy rating on National Semiconductor Corp with a $40 12-month price target on the stock.

-- Gruntal noted National Semiconductor's agreement to acquire privately held Mediamatics Inc, a supplier of audio and video decoders to the personal computer market. It said with this transaction, National Semiconductor will be in a strong position to accelerate its momentum into home entertainment appliances, such as Digital Versatile Disk and digital set-top boxes.
